p.span: The mission of Donna ISD is to provide a rigorous and supportive learning environment with meaningful and relevant learning experiences that inspire creativity, character development, and critical thinking that ensures educational excellence for all students.

p.a: DISD is transitioning from Lighthouse to Anonymous Alerts

p.span: The vision of Donna ISD is to be a bold district at the forefront of educating all students to be passionate, motivated leaders who will be a powerful force for positive change in our community, state and nation.

img.alt: In the News with Donna ISD

div.p: Donna ISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, language, or disability in providing education services, activities and programs, including Career and Technical Education programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Acts of 1964 to include FFH (Local Policy) Student Welfare of freedom from discrimination, harassment, and retaliation and FFI (Local Policy) Student Welfare of freedom from bullying.

Es norma de el Distrito Escolar de Donna no discriminar por motivos de raza, color, origen nacional, sexo o impedimento, en sus programas, servicios o actividades vocacionales, tal como lo requieren el Título VI de la Ley de Derechos Civiles de 1964, según enmienda; el Título IX de las Enmiendas en la Educación, de 1972, y la Sección 504 de la Ley de Rehabilitación de 1973, según enmienda.

span.br:
116 North 10th Street
Donna, Texas 78537
Phone: 956-464-1600
Fax: 956-464-1752
